strings.string: RUS_Change your digital satellite receiver settings

RUS_Display the programme information of each channel in time and date order

RUS_Manage and view your multimedia content in one place
RUS_Display device information including system versions, free disk space, etc

RUS_Access your picture collection and view them as a slideshow with transition effects

RUS_Access your favorite XBMC add-ons in a convenient way
RUS_Take the following steps for getting your PRISMCUBE RUBY ready for use

RUS_When set to 'On', LNBs will be switched between low and high band
RUS_When set to 'On', DiSEqC repeats its command
RUS_Set one of the pre-defined transponder frequency and symbol rate to get the best signal strength and quality in order to confirm that your settings are correct

RUS_When set to 'Off', only the factory default transponders of the satellites you previously selected will be scanned for new channels. If you set to 'On', both the existing transponders and additional transponders that have not yet been stored to be located are scanned for new channels
RUS_Press OK button to start a channel search
RUS_Enter new name for this satellite
RUS_Are you sure you want to remove\nthis transponder?
RUS_No channels available for the selected mode
RUS_When set to 'Separated', the tuner 2 receives its own signal input however it will receive only the channel level currently being received by the tuner 1 when this is set to 'Loopthrough'
RUS_When set to 'Same with Tuner 1', both tuners are connected to the same signal source
RUS_Select a control method for tuner 1
RUS_You can add, delete or configure satellites here

RUS_Try again after stopping all your recordings first
